title: App Manager
extract: An application manager (app manager) is programming for overseeing the installation, patching and updating and perhaps access of software applications. An application manager can be used to monitor a software application's performance and alert administrators if there is a problem.
extract_html: An application manager (app manager) is programming for overseeing the installation, patching and updating and perhaps access of software applications. An application manager can be used to monitor a software application's performance and alert administrators if there is a problem.
